meanings.definition: A family of small moths with broad wings and a characteristic resting posture.
meanings.sent1: The garden was filled with tortricids fluttering gracefully in the air.
meanings.sent2: Farmers often spot tortricids resting on leaves in their fields.
meanings.sent3: The tortricids decided to have a race to see who could fly the highest.
meanings.sent4: The tortricids danced in the sky, their wings like delicate fans.
meanings.sent5: The tortricids painted the sky with their colorful wings, a sight to behold.

meanings.definition: Any member of the family Tortricidae, including many agricultural pests.
meanings.sent1: The orchard was infested with tortricids, causing damage to the fruit trees.
meanings.sent2: Farmers work hard to protect their crops from tortricids.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous tortricids played hide-and-seek among the apple trees.
meanings.sent4: The tortricids invaded the fields like an army of tiny invaders.
meanings.sent5: The tortricids feasted on the harvest, leaving a trail of destruction behind them.

meanings.definition: The larvae of tortricid moths, known for their destructive feeding habits.
meanings.sent1: The tortricids larvae chewed through the leaves, leaving a path of destruction.
meanings.sent2: Gardeners struggle to control the spread of tortricids larvae in their plants.
meanings.sent3: The hungry tortricids larvae had a feast in the vegetable patch.
meanings.sent4: The tortricids larvae devoured the crops like tiny green monsters.
meanings.sent5: The tortricids larvae left a trail of devastation in their wake, a silent threat to the garden.
